channel.title: [508] ip changer help [508]
channel.description:
Ok i need help BAD, ok so when i go into Umairscape client ip chnager and click run i can't run it properly because of java or somthing, here is what it says
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
If you can help in any way tell me plz!!! :(:(:(:(:(:(

item.title: [508] ip changer help [508]
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

MrWilliams13,

I have seen people have this problem and is usually fixed by changing your Enviroment Variables

Do this:
Press start button, then right click my computer then go to properties, Go to advanced tab look down in your system variables.
Double click “CLASSPATH” and paste this into it: “.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip” then scroll down and find your “Path” variable and double click it and put this into it: " %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem;C:\Program Files\Common Files\DivX Shared" , hopefully this helps.

Read full topic
